original_text: The widow left Elisha. She went into her house with her sons and she shut the door behind her. They brought the jars to her and she poured the oil into them.
korean_text: 여인이 물러가서 그의 두 아들과 함께 문을 닫은 후에 그들은 그릇을 그에게로 가져오고 그는 부었더니

sentences.original_text: She went into her house with her sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 아들들과 함께 자기 집으로 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and she shut the door behind her
They brought the jars to her
and she poured the oil into them
